task: Create a JSON policy document that allows read-only access to all objects in a specific S3 bucket named 'my-data-bucket'
Write a Python function that takes an S3 object key and returns the file extension (e.g., 'logs/2023/data.csv' should return 'csv')
Create a regex pattern that matches valid AWS S3 bucket names (3-63 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, no consecutive hyphens, no leading/trailing hyphens)
